review:
Exceptional Orthopedic Surgeon Alleviates Low Back Pain with Precision and Care

Dr. Rajesh Gayakwad is an outstanding orthopedic surgeon who specializes in treating low back pain. My experience under him care was nothing short of exceptional, and I wholeheartedly recommend him to anyone seeking relief from debilitating back issues.
 He took the time to listen attentively to my concerns, thoroughly examined my medical history, and conducted a comprehensive evaluation of my condition. He explained my diagnosis in clear, understandable terms, ensuring that I was well-informed and actively involved in decision-making regarding my care. 

Thanks to Dr. Gayakwad's expertise and dedication, I have experienced a significant reduction in low back pain and a dramatic improvement in overall quality of life. His holistic approach to care, combined with his exceptional surgical skills, truly sets him apart as a leader in the field of orthopedic surgery.

In conclusion, I cannot speak highly enough of Dr. Rajesh Gayakwad and the outstanding care he provides to patients suffering from low back pain. If you are seeking a compassionate, skilled orthopedic surgeon who prioritizes patient well-being above all else, look no further than Dr. Gayakwad.

review: One of the finest Orthos. He patiently listens to you problems and explains the problem and its solution in simple and layman terms . Half your problems are resolved speaking to Dr. Rajesh. Would highly recommend. Him

I had visited for back and knee pain.Doctor is very empathetic as he listened to my problem very patiently without much hurry even during his busy OPD waiting .Also,he examined me in detail which was rarely done by other doctors whom I visited previously. Treatment wise his medicines are minimum and focused on general advice with life style modification. This helped me very much in long term.I Definitely recommend this doctor.

I had visited for Neck pain.Doctor was quite patient in listening my my complaints and did detailed examination. No other doctor gave such time in my previous visits. I surely recommend this doctor.

I consulted Dr. Rajesh for knee and neck pain. He was very polite and empathetic in his approach. He performed a detailed assessment of my condition and explained the same in simple language. I was relieved of the symptoms with his treatment and would definitely recommend him for orthopedic treatment.
